name: The Missing Stardust Cargo
description: A valuable shipment of stardust has gone missing from the space train's cargo hold. Investigate the passengers to find clues about what happened.

clue_a.name: Cargo Hold Breach
clue_a.description: The cargo hold's security system was disabled during the last stop. Someone with high-level access codes bypassed the stardust containment field.
clue_a.hint: Circuit-7 knows all about the ship's systems.
clue_a.conversation_lead: Circuit-7 is very knowledgeable about the space train's technical systems. He might mention security protocols, cargo systems, or technical malfunctions if asked about ship operations, cargo safety, or system status. Guide conversations toward technical and security topics.

clue_b.name: Suspicious Passenger
clue_b.description: A passenger in a trenchcoat was seen near the cargo area during the last stop. They were carrying a glowing container and seemed very nervous.
clue_b.hint: Luna Stardust is very observant and might have noticed something.
clue_b.conversation_lead: Luna is a curious navigator trainee who pays attention to details. She might share observations about other passengers, unusual behavior, or suspicious activities if asked about what she's noticed, other passengers, or unusual events. Steer conversations toward her observations.

clue_c.name: Stardust Sample
clue_c.description: A small amount of stardust was found scattered near the cargo hold entrance. The particles are still glowing, indicating recent tampering.
clue_c.hint: Zorblax the Monster loves collecting space rocks and might know about stardust.
clue_c.conversation_lead: Zorblax is fascinated by space materials and rocks. He might discuss stardust, space minerals, or unusual cosmic materials if asked about space rocks, cosmic phenomena, or rare materials. Guide conversations toward his knowledge of space materials.
